document.full_text: briton lee westwood clinched the ballantine's championship by a stroke on sunday with a scorching final round that secured his second consecutive title in asia and consolidated his world number one ranking.
document.title: in-form westwood charges home to win ballantine's
lines_and_colors: briton lee westwood clinched the ballantine's championship by a stroke on sunday with a scorching final round that secured his second consecutive title in asia and consolidated his world number one ranking.
